The test requires express shipping to ensure timely results. The kit does not include prepaid return shipping, adding to costs. Lab results can be unreliable if shipping is delayed. The test does not include a prepaid return envelope.
Testing fees are higher than advertised. The kit is straightforward but misleading about included costs.

cont.entity_b: Affordable and reliable for detecting gas leaks.
